auto_indexes_tips: Generate extra indexes to improve semantic richness and search accuracy.
backup_dataset_tip: Import the CSV file downloaded during the knowledge base export.
backup_template_invalid: Invalid backup file. It must be a CSV file with the first columns being q,a,indexes.
chunk_trigger_max_size: Text exceeds 70% of the max context length.
chunk_trigger_tips: Chunking is triggered only when the specified condition is met. Otherwise, the full text is stored.
close_auto_sync: Are you sure you want to disable auto sync?
collection_not_support_retraining: Parameter adjustment is not supported for this collection type.
collection_not_support_sync: Sync is not supported for this collection type.
collection_sync_confirm_tip: Are you sure you want to sync data? The system will obtain the latest data for comparison. If differences are found, a new collection will be created and the old one will be removed. Would you like to proceed?
common.dataset.data.Input Error Tip: Error occurred while processing the image dataset:
common_dataset_desc: Build a knowledge base by importing files, adding web links, or manual input.
confirm_to_rebuild_embedding_tip:
Are you sure you want to switch the index for this knowledge base?
Switching the index will re-index all data in the knowledge base, which may take a long time. Please ensure you have sufficient AI points.

Update apps linked to this knowledge base to avoid confusion with other index models.
custom_split_sign_tip:
Use custom delimiters to accurately split data. Best for pre-processed data. Use | to define multiple delimiters. Example: “。 | .” for Chinese and English periods.
Avoid regex characters such as * () [] {}.
external_file_dataset_desc: Build a knowledge base via API using external file databases.
external_other_dataset_desc: Build a knowledge base using external documents (including custom API, Feishu, and Yuque documents).
external_read_url_tip: Configure the reading URL of your file database. Used for user access authentication. You can use the {{fileId}} variable to represent the external file ID.
failedToLoadRootDirectories: Failed to load the root directory.
feishu_dataset_desc: You can build a knowledge base from Feishu documents and set permissions. The documents will not be stored again.
file_model_function_tip: Used to enhance indexes and Q&A generation.
image_auto_parse_tips: Automatically mark images in documents using the VLM and generate search indexes for them.
import.Auto mode Estimated Price Tips: Text understanding model call is required, and the consumed AI points ({{price}} points/1K tokens) is high.
import.Embedding Estimated Price Tips: Only index model call is required, and the consumed AI points: ({{price}} points / 1K tokens) is low.
index_prefix_title_tips: Automatically add titles to all indexes.
index_size_tips: The content length during vectorization. The system will automatically create indexes for chunks based on the specified index size.
input_required_field_to_select_baseurl: Please configure the required fields first.
insert_images_success: Image added successfully. It will be displayed only after training is complete.
llm_paragraph_mode_auto_desc: Enable paragraph recognition if the text does not contain titles in Markdown format.
llm_paragraph_mode_force_desc: Forcibly implement auto paragraph recognition using the model and ignore the original paragraph structure (if any).
move.hint: If moved, the knowledge base or folder will inherit the permissions of the destination folder, invalidating its current permissions.
open_auto_sync: If scheduled sync is enabled, the system will attempt to sync the collection at any time every day. Data from the collection cannot be searched during the collection sync.
paragraph_split_tip: Split the text based on Markdown heading structure first. If a chunk exceeds the maximum length, it will be split further based on the length.
pdf_enhance_parse_tips: Call a PDF recognition model to parse PDF files, converting PDF files into Markdown format with images preserved, and process scanned copies of PDF files, which takes a longer time.
permission.des.manage: Manages all knowledge base data and information.
permission.des.write: Adds and modifies the knowledge base content.
pleaseFillUserIdAndToken: User ID and token are required.
preview_chunk_not_selected: Click a file on the left for preview.
request_headers: Request header parameter. Bearer will be automatically added.
retrain_task_submitted: The retraining task has been submitted.
rootDirectoryFormatError: The entries in the root directory are invalid.
start_sync_dataset_tip: Are you sure you want to sync the entire knowledge base?
sync_collection_failed: Error occurred while syncing the collection. Please check whether the source file is accessible.
sync_schedule_tip: Only existing collections will be synced, including link collections and all collections in the API knowledge base. The update time is not fixed because the system will update collections based on round-robin scheduling.
tag.delete_tag_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the tag?
template_file_invalid: Invalid template file. It must be a CSV file with the first columns being q,a,indexes.
the_knowledge_base_has_indexes_that_are_: The knowledge base contains indexes that are being trained or rebuilt.
upload_by_template_format: File format must be consistent with the template.
website_dataset_desc: Bulk crawl data on a website to build a knowledge base.
yuque_dataset_desc: You can build a knowledge base from Yuque documents and set permissions. The documents will not be stored again.
enterprise_database_desc: Create a knowledge base and connect it to a MySQL database to search for related information.
enterprise_database_embedding_model_tip: The index model can convert critical database information (including the table name, table description, column name, and column description) into vectors for semantic search.
database_structure_change_tip: When the data structure changes, including changes to the table or column name, please refresh the data sources.
host_tips: Please enter an accessible address. Ensure the database is connected to FastGPT.
connection_pool_min_error: Max connections cannot be smaller than 1.
database_config_title: The knowledge base will create indexes for data in the selected data tables.
table_description_placeholder: Default value: Predefined description in the data table
default_table_description: Default value: Predefined description in the data table
default_column_description: Default value: Predefined description in the data table
edit_database_config_warning: Data sources have been configured. {{changedCount}} data tables have column changes, and {{deletedCount}} no longer exist. Please update the data.
edit_database_warning: After database information is modified, apps will be disconnected from the database and may fail to search for information.
reconnect_success: Reconnected to the database. Configuration changed successfully.
auth_failed: Failed to connect to the database because authentication failed. Please check the username and password.
reconnect_success_detail: Reconnected to the database. Configuration changed successfully.
table_changes_notice: {{changedCount}} data tables have column changes, and {{deletedCount}} no longer exist. Please update the data.
column_desc_accuracy_tip: To increase the accuracy of answers, please accurately describe the meaning and purpose of the data in a column. The model will select the columns to search for information and generate answers based on the column description.
default_table_desc_tip: The predefined description in the data table is used by default.
column_enabled_tip: If enabled, the model will search this column for information needed to generate answers.
connection_network_error: Connection failed. Please check network connectivity.
validate_ip_tip: Local loopback addresses (such as localhost, 127.x.x.x, and 0.0.0.0) are not supported.
search_model_desc: 用于生成可在数据库中检索的SQL语句，并进行检索与汇总，生成可用于对话的文本。
search_model_tip: 使用非推理模型、参数量大的模型效果更佳。
confirm_remove_database_table: 确认移除该数据表及其所有数据配置？
tables_with_column_changes: {{modifiedTablesCount}} 个数据表存在列的变更，
tables_modified: {{modifiedTables}} 个数据表存在列的变更
